content.rendered:
Directed By Pavan Kumar .R.

Stars Priyanka Shivanna (Jennifer). Gaurish Akki ((as Gowrish Akki)). Balarajwadi (Baskar Ponnappa (as Bala Rajwadi)). Harinishreekanth (Lakshmi Ponnappa (as Harini Shreekanth)). Anuraag S. Patil (Akhil Ponnappa). Hemanth Srinivas (Arjun Ponnappa)

Language Kannada

Producer Pavan Kumar .R.

Production Pavan Dream Films
